meanings.definition: The quality of being flexible or adaptable.
meanings.sent1: Her dance performance showcased her suppleness and grace.
meanings.sent2: Yoga helps improve suppleness in the body.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unexpected suppleness made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The suppleness of the fabric allowed for easy movement.
meanings.sent5: The gymnast's suppleness was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: The ability to bend or move easily and gracefully.
meanings.sent1: The gymnast's suppleness amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: Regular stretching exercises can enhance suppleness.
meanings.sent3: The robot's surprising suppleness made it a hit at the fair.
meanings.sent4: The suppleness of the branches swayed gently in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's suppleness was like a flowing river.

meanings.definition: The state of being pliant or easily bent.
meanings.sent1: The suppleness of the rubber band allowed it to stretch without breaking.
meanings.sent2: The suppleness of the dough made it easy to shape into a loaf.
meanings.sent3: The clown's exaggerated suppleness brought smiles to the children's faces.
meanings.sent4: The suppleness of the willow tree branches created a beautiful canopy.
meanings.sent5: The suppleness of the snake was both fascinating and eerie.
